DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy Kovacaine Mist administer bilaterally Kovacaine Mist administer unilaterally respect global profound pulpal anesthesia target teeth number 4-13 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Anesthetic Efficacy Bilateral Unillateral Application Kovacaine Mist Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Qualified consent healthy subject randomly assign double-blind manner sequence four randomly order study period inter-treatment `` washout '' period 3 14 day . The four study regimen , apply random order : - Regimen1 . Three spray Kovacaine Mist nostril ( bilateral dosing ) ; - Regimen 2 . Three spray Kovacaine Mist right nostril three spray placebo leave nostril ( right-sided unilateral dosing ) ; - Regimen 3 . Three spray Kovacaine Mist leave nostril three spray placebo right nostril ( left-sided unilateral dosing ) ; - Regimen 4 . Three spray placebo nostril ( placebo dose ) . During test period , eight representative maxillary teeth ( # 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 9 , 11 , 13 14 ) assess anesthesia use standard EPT testing . EPT test conduct eight representative teeth follow time point ( minute relative first spray study drug ) : T-5 , T3 , T7 , T11 , T16 , T21 , T26T31 , T41 , T51 , T61 , T76 , T91 , T121 , T151 , T181 . If EPT test target tooth possible ( e.g. , miss meet inclusion criterion # 2 ) tooth substitution permissible . For molar teeth , # 2 may replace # 3 # 15 may replace # 14 . For premolar teeth , # 5 may replace # 4 # 12 may replace # 13 . The replacement make test session , actual teeth test documented CRF .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year age old . Eight representative maxillary teeth [ ( 3 ( 2 ) , 4 ( 5 ) , 6 , 8 , 9 , 11 , 13 ( 12 ) , 14 ( or15 ) ] free observable decay ( pathology ) , crowns veneer , EPT value 1050 screening . Normal lip , nose , eyelid , palate , cheek sensation . Patency leave right nasal airway . Ability understand willingness sign study inform consent form , communicate study investigator , understand comply requirement study protocol . Poorly control hypertension ( blood pressure great 150/90 mmHg ) history coronary heart disease . Diabetes mellitus . Any active thyroid disease S/P thyroidectomy thyroid hormone replacement TSH value normal range . History presence narrowangle glaucoma . Prostatic enlargement . History sinus/nasal surgery , opinion investigator , could confound study result . History frequent nose bleeds . Receipt dental care require local anesthetic within last 24 hour . History allergy intolerance tetracaine , benzyl alcohol , benzocaine , ester local anesthetic , succinylcholine , paraaminobenzoic acid ( find PABAcontaining sunscreen ) . History allergy hypersensitivity articaine , oxymetazoline , epinephrine , sulfite antioxidant . History drug abuse . Use monoamine oxidase inhibitor within 3 week immediately prior anticipate study participation . Nursing , pregnant , suspected pregnant , try become pregnant . ( Females require undergo pregnancy test rule pregnancy ) Use investigational drug and/or participation clinical research trial within 30 day first study dose day . Requirement uninterrupted use medication action might , opinion involve investigator , confound interpretation study result .
